verbLexeme: 1. Of a man or a woman, but especially of a female prostitute, to stand in a public place in order to attract men who are willing to pay money to have sex with you. English = solicit.

2. Of a man, to go to special places in order to meet other men and have casual sex with them, or arrange to have casual sex with them. Gay (homosexual) slang sign. Idiomatic English = do the beat, cruise, go cruising.
nominalLexeme: 1. Of a man or a woman, but especially of a female prostitute, the act of standing in a public place in order to attract men who are willing to pay money to have sex with you. English = soliciting.

2. A place where men have, or arrange to have, casual sex with each other. These places are often located in parks or beaches. Gay (homosexual) deaf slang sign. Gay (homosexual) slang English = beat, cruising area.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: swinging keys on a chain while standing on the street.
